customers.usage_stats: 15% increase in active customers MoM. Most revenue from reputable tech startups. Pre-qualification effort shifted focus away from agencies. Recent customer additions: Truecaller, Skit, Cisco. Some startup churn in the last week.

team.operation_notes: Rebranding process due to trademark conflict. Ongoing enterprise pilots. Targeting enterprise conversion.

notes: Mature UAE competitor copied product after acquisition talks. Some startups churned recently. Rebranding required after trademark conflict with healthcare giant. Enterprises piloting, conversion slow. Goal: grow to $35k MRR, onboard an enterprise client.
